Calculation¶

class convtrack.calculation.Calculation(incar: str, poscar: str, potcar: str, dims: Iterable, calc_folder: str, kpoints: str = None, create=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

Methods Summary

complete()

Checks whether the corresponding VASP job has completed by checking whether the timing info is in the OUTCAR.

energy()

Checks the OUTCAR for energy :return: A float containing the energy (in eV) if the job has completed, otherwise None

setup_calc([submit])

Sets up a calculation, by copying in the INCAR / KPOINTS / POTCAR, and writing a POSCAR.

started()

Checks whether a calculation has started or not by looking at whether OUTCAR has been created.

Methods Documentation

complete() → bool[source]¶

Checks whether the corresponding VASP job has completed by checking whether the timing info is in the OUTCAR. :return: True if the job has completed, otherwise False

energy() → float[source]¶

Checks the OUTCAR for energy :return: A float containing the energy (in eV) if the job has completed, otherwise None

setup_calc(submit=False) → None[source]¶

Sets up a calculation, by copying in the INCAR / KPOINTS / POTCAR, and writing a POSCAR. :return: None

started() → bool[source]¶

Checks whether a calculation has started or not by looking at whether OUTCAR has been created. :return: True if the job has started, otherwise False
